cu.explanation_en: Setting the PDCP log level to an invalid value will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper PDCP layer debugging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the uplink carrier bandwidth to zero will invalidate the uplink frequency configuration and prevent proper uplink carrier setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行鏈路載波頻寬設定為零會使上行鏈路頻率配置無效，並阻止正確的上行鏈路載波設定。
